body_html: We use this PR to test whether our script change can cause build failure. The build failure is not related to mkldnn integration and more about the software tool/library version and environment setup. We use cmake file to run some test at build time to diagnosis which is very inefficient. Can we get help from build team to take a look and give us some directions. @jspisak

The build failure is not related to mkldnn integration and more about the software tool/library version and environment setup.
